  • Method Details

    • placeStone

      public boolean placeStone​(Player player, int row, int column)
      get a cell and if it possible put stone there
      Parameters:
      player - player
      row - row of cell
      column - column of cell
      Returns:
      true if the entered row and column is valid and its possible to put or false if not.

    • spin

      public boolean spin​(int quadrant, char spinDirection)
      spin a block in an specific direction
      Parameters:
      quadrant - quadrant to spin
      spinDirection - spin direction between clockwise or Counterclockwise.
      Returns:
      true if the entered quadrant and spin direction are valid or false if not.

    • checkFinish

      public boolean checkFinish​(Player player)
      check if one of the player win or not.
      Parameters:
      player - player to check
      Returns:
      true if finish or false if not.

    • checkAround

      public boolean checkAround​(int i, int j, int colorCode)
      check all around the cell
      Parameters:
      i - row of cell
      j - column of cell
      colorCode - color code of player
      Returns:
      true if at least in one direction are 5 stone in a row or false if there is not any direction.

    • checkDirection

      public boolean checkDirection​(int k, int l, int i, int j, int colorCode)
      get a cell and two parameter to check an specific direction around it.
      Parameters:
      k - its added to make new row
      l - its added to make new column
      i - row of cell
      j - column of cell
      colorCode - color to check
      Returns:
      true if there are 5 stone in a row or false if not.

    • isFull

      public boolean isFull()
      check if the map is full or not.
      Returns:
      true if it is full or false if not

    • isInMap

      public boolean isInMap​(int i, int j)
      check if the cell is in map or not.
      Parameters:
      i - row of cell
      j - column of cell
      Returns:
      true if it is in map and false if not.

    • printMap

      public void printMap()
      print map of the game
